CompilationError.why: Syntax error, type mismatch, or missing declaration
fix: Check the file and line number in error message
Check for missing semicolons or brackets
Ensure variable types match their usage

RevertError.why: Contract logic caused revert, often from require() or revert() statement
fix: Check the revert reason in the error message
Verify all require() conditions are met
Review contract logic for revert conditions
Check if contract state allows the operation
Check the require condition that failed
Review contract state before the require
Add better error messages to require() statements

GasError.what: Gas estimation failed or limit exceeded
GasError.why: Transaction requires more gas than available or estimated
fix: Optimize contract code to reduce gas usage
Check for infinite loops or excessive storage operations
Use events instead of storage for logging

DeploymentError.why: Constructor failed, insufficient gas, or network issue

TypeError.why: Variable types don't match or implicit conversion failed
fix: Check for address vs address payable
Check for bytes vs string issues

VisibilityError.why: Accessing private/internal from wrong context or missing visibility
fix: Add correct visibility modifier (public, private, internal, external)
Check if function can be called from current context

OverrideError.why: Override keyword missing or function signature mismatch
fix: Add override keyword to overriding function
Verify function signature matches base contract
Use virtual keyword in base function

StorageError.why: Incorrect storage location or storage collision
fix: Use calldata for external function parameters
Use larger integer types if needed

EventError.why: Event not defined, wrong parameters, or indexing issue
fix: Check event is declared in contract

ModifierError.why: Modifier logic failed or modifier not applied correctly
fix: Verify modifier is applied to function
Check for access control in modifier

InheritanceError.why: Inheritance conflict, linearization issue, or missing override

ABIError.why: Function call data doesn't match ABI or encoding failed

LibraryError.why: Library not linked, function not found, or usage error
fix: Check for library linking in deployment script

HardhatError.why: Hardhat configuration, network, or script error

TruffleError.why: Truffle configuration, migration, or deployment error
